caption:
Firmware in a CanSat refers to the low-level software that controls the hardware components of the miniature satellite. The firmware in a CanSat is crucial because it governs how the satellite's sensors, communication systems, and other electronic components operate.

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping #telemetry #datatransmission

The FSW department of DJS Arya is responsible for developing, testing, and maintaining the software that controls the CanSat during its mission. FSW ensures that all onboard systems, including sensors, communication modules, and actuators, operate correctly and efficiently throughout the flight

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping #telemetry #datatransmission

The FSW department plays a critical role in the flight of a CanSat, ensuring that the software controlling the CanSat operates correctly during each phase of its mission.

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping #telemetry #datatransmission

The designing of the circuit includes the use of bread board and perf board along with jumper cables.  It is an iterative process until the final circuit is implemented on the PCB, after immense data transmission and range tests

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping #telemetry #datatransmission

Presenting the Avionics Department of DJS Arya which calibrates all the sensors and designs the PCB of the CanSat along with looking after uninterrupted communication and intensive testing.🚀

The function of the PCB in a CanSat stands comparable to that of the Brain in the Human Body.

Team DJS Arya is grateful to @pcbpowerindia for their constant support and encouragement in this journey.

Ground Station:
Consisting of an RF antenna and a custom built Graphic User Interface(GUI), the ground station is a real time visualization of the mission sequence of events of the entire flight of the CanSat

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping #telemetry #datatransmission

Telemetry:
A look at DJS Arya’s telemetry sub-department, ensuring steady reception and transmission of data packets between the CanSat and our Ground Station.

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping #telemetry #datatransmission

CanSat:
Our autonomous CanSat transmits real-time data to the Ground Station during the entire mission sequence of events.

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping #telemetry #datatransmission

Nose Cone:
Nose Cone is the top most part of rocket which is purposed to cut through the air as it is launched. The Nose Cone is required to be strictly symmetrical to ensure that the projectile doesn’t change while ascent.

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping

Our first prototype of the test rocket features a hollow, lightweight but a durable nose cone.

#nasa #space #spaceexploration #spacetechnology #spacetech #cansat #engineering #students #teamindia #electronics #pcb #mechanicalengineering #management #coding #india #team #pcbdesign 
#imaginationdeployed #cansat #cansatcompetition #rocketry #prototyping

Parachute Bay:
It is where the parachute is situated during launch and will automatically deploy as soon as the rocket ejection charges fire. One end of the parachute will be attached to the nose while the other will be attached to the bulk plate.
